headline: ODOT construction season
sentences: The governor detailed a plan yesterday to spend close to two-billion dollars on more than eight-hundred projects across the state.
ODOT leaders are also reminding drivers to use caution, slow down, and move over for crews at work on Ohio roads.
Governor Mike DeWine is announcing the beginning of this year's construction along Ohio roadways.
DeWine says transportation maintenance is key to the state's safety and economic development.
